aboutMe.title: About Me
resume: I'm Bertrand, a 24 years old guy from Belgium curious about the world who likes to learn and help others. I started programming because I felt it could be a game-changer in the educational system, but it is still not well-used. My main focuses are a greener, more accessible, open source, privacy-oriented web and better ways to learn.
I have interests in a lot of stuff, such as are environment, nature, scouts, science and mathematics, game design,… and am always open to discover something new.
Besides programming, I'm learning to be a nature guide and I've been a scoutmaster for 8 years.

hobbies.name: Scouts
hobbies.desc: I've been a scout since I was 6, in 2002. For the moral that it brought me and the maturity and autonomy it thought me, scoutism is without a doubt the hobby that have had the biggest impact on my vision of the world. As I finished my journey in 2013, I decided to transmit that passion to others and have been a scoutmaster ever since.

hobbies.name: Video games
hobbies.desc: Since I'm young, video games always have occupied a big place in my heart. The technical prowesses such as game design, artistic direction or programming techniques are some aspects among others that fascinate me. My personnal preferences goes to Nintendo games as well as indie titles.

hobbies.name: Board games
hobbies.desc: Board games entertain me and fascinate me as much as video game for the cleverness that lies behind the intricate game mechanics and also for the bond it can create between players. I'm always up to discover some new games or new ways to play even though my favorite category of games is cooperative gameplay.

hobbies.name: Pixel art
hobbies.desc: You might have noticed that just by seeing the few images that are on this website. Does it come from the fact that I started video games or is it because I've never been a good drawer ? Probably a bit of both. Even though I've not made a lot of pixel art myself, I enjoy making some and am a fan of the minimalism and the complexity it has to offer.

hobbies.name: Build my opinions
hobbies.desc: Weird name for a hobby, isn't it ? Yet, I'm aware that nobody is perfect, myself first. According strong importance to my opinions in my everyday decision-making, I believe it's necessary to continuously learn, update and rethink those thoughts in order to make my attitude the most rational. These days, I've been actively documenting on environmental questions as well as the right to privacy.
